title: [HELP]

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I can't download league of legend because of microsoft visual c++ 2005 syntax error. I have no clue why this occurs, I've tried to find if it was downloaded previously, but it wasn't. Riot can you please save my life?

replies.body: This error usually happens with a new PC or out of date version of windows, because it's missing products needed to install.  Updating your Windows to the most current version should fix this up, but you can also[ manually download ](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)the package.  Hopefully, that will help finish up the installation!
